>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.unJ8E4IikZUxT7x3]{Temporal Anomalies (Su)}

By tugging on the strands of fate, you peer into the future and force a foe to witness a bleak and terrifying potential outcome—perhaps even their own death. As a standard action, you can use a paradox to focus on a creature within 60 feet, forcing them to witness a painful possible future. The creature must succeed at a Will saving throw or gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken} condition for a number of rounds equal to half the paradox (minimum 1). If they fail at this saving throw by 10 or more, they’re @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} instead.

duration.value: Number of rounds equal to half the paradox (minimum 1)
